item.title: Raichur upgraded to municipal corporation
item.description:
<![CDATA[Raichur: The government has officially issued a notification upgrading Raichur City Municipality to Raichur Municipal Corporation. The decision to elevate the municipality to a municipal corporation was taken after inviting objections and suggestions from the public. Since no objections were received, the Urban Development Department has now issued the official notification.
The decision was made in a recent Cabinet meeting chaired by Chief Minister Siddaramaiah in Kalaburagi, where it was reso...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
